repo_name = #{repoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repo_url = #{repoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from tbl_repo_info
and repo_name like concat('%',#{repoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and "status"=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by create_time desc
